title: Packet loss unknown cause
body:
I have packet loss which is causing the game to lag. Ping is constant at 37ms. The lag is that commands don't go through or they lag. I see everyhting happening but my champ doesn't always follow commands promptly. ping 104.160.141.3 -t results in many request timed outs. The problem is less severe now that I changed the cable from the TV connection in my wall to modem. Here are my tracert results:

  1    <1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  
  2    22 ms     5 ms     5 ms  
  3     9 ms     *       20 ms  
  4    10 ms    11 ms     8 ms  213.192.186.78
  5     9 ms    13 ms     *     213.192.186.77
  6     *       39 ms    38 ms  213.192.184.254
  7     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  8    31 ms    46 ms    34 ms  104.160.141.3

  1    <1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  
  2     6 ms     9 ms     7 ms  
  3    21 ms     7 ms     7 ms  
  4    13 ms    10 ms     *     213.192.186.78
  5     9 ms    16 ms    10 ms  213.192.186.77
  6    29 ms     *        *     213.192.184.254
  7     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  8     *       32 ms    29 ms  104.160.141.3

  1    <1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  
  2     5 ms     7 ms     7 ms  
  3     7 ms     6 ms     8 ms  
  4    11 ms     9 ms     9 ms  213.192.186.78
  5    10 ms    11 ms     8 ms  213.192.186.77
  6    30 ms    28 ms    29 ms  213.192.184.254
  7     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  8    31 ms    31 ms    30 ms  104.160.141.3

Can anyone tell me if there is something I could do about this? Is my modem fried?

replies.body: Same problems. I run different programs, like hextech repair tool. Result=0 packet loss. Why I didn't have any problems before the new patch? I mean, before the patch the game run perfectly, after the patch I get "packet loss", just wow. And the other thing is that i can play normal(no lag problems) games like cod, battlefield, dota, fifa, overwatch, hots, cs go... but this one? Nope! Really now? Really? Packet loss? Why there is no packet loss on the other games too?
I'm experiencing similar issues. 1 minute i'll be fine the next minute i'm experiencing extreme packet loss only started happening for me in the last 3-4 days or so
Exact same thing that is happening to me, it started 3 days ago. It's happening to streamers tho like gosu.

Packet loss are usually caused by connection issues, and can certainly result in the input delays being reported.  This may not be a hardware or fried modem problem, but I suggest ruling out possibilities that can cause this.  Go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for some troubleshooting steps towards getting these resolved.  Hopefully that will do the trick!
